title: If there were two boats on the river, let's call them boat A and boat B and you knew one of them was going to sink, which one would you go on? (You have to get on one so neither is not an option) - Quora

response.answer_text: Well i guess loophole time. I know one of them will sink. I will go on the boat that will not sink. See, your premisses are vageue on what boat actually sinks, (probabbly what you mean is that I would not kniw witch one will sink) but your premisses doe not exclude me knowing what boat will sink. So i take the liberty of me actually knowing what boat will sink, and avoid that one.
